data.name: Personalized Movie Recommendation System
data.description: Built a scalable recommender system for 1M users and 27K movies, delivering top 20 movie lists within 800ms. Combined collaborative filtering and deep learning with automated model retraining via containerized CI/CD workflows. Deployed real-time monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana.

data.name: Latent Completion Networks for Missing Modality Handling
data.description: Built a robust VAE architecture to infer missing modalities using a latent completion network and PoE fusion. Achieved a 12% improvement in SSIM over baselines (MVAE, MMVAE) on FashionMNIST under 50% missing data. Enabled uncertainty-aware generation using MC Dropout and variance regularization.

data.name: Efficient Multimodal Skip-Gram Learning
data.description: Designed a VQ-GAN + BEATs based audio-video representation learning model evaluated on VGGSound and UCF-101. Reached 85.67% accuracy on UCF-101 for action recognition using learned audio-visual embeddings. Reduced training time by 30% vs. transformer-based models with minimal tuning.

data.name: Locally Connected Layers for Robust Speech Models
data.description: Benchmarked Conformer ASR variants with locally untied convolutions on LibriSpeech. Replaced CNNs with locally connected layers, achieving a 3.61% WER on LibriSpeech test-clean and 15â€“20% reduction in adversarial error across noisy conditions vs. baseline Conformer.

data.name: Emotion Classification of EEG Signals
data.description: Extracted EEG features using Wavelet Transforms and reached 84.39% accuracy using Symbolic Regression for 4-class emotion prediction. Applied cross-validation across multiple participants to ensure subject-independent generalization of emotional state predictions.

data.name: Fake News Detection
data.description: Processed 10,000+ articles at 1000 articles/sec, detecting false stories with 98% (Hindi) and 93% (English) accuracy. Integrated linguistic and metadata-based features with a multi-language transformer pipeline for robust classification.

data.name: Password Manager
data.description: Built a cross-platform desktop application using Flask and ElectronJS, featuring local encryption and XMLRPC-based API communication. Implemented secure password generation and strength assessment modules with category-based organization and search functionality.
